brief.brief: The time zone to use when the Alert is processed.
If selected (set to true), each option displays other field(s) to qualify the time zone setting.
If you do not select an option, the default is the system-wide time zone setting.

detail.detail: This field specifies the methods available to derive the time zone to use in calculating the alert time.
Service Manager displays this field as mutually exclusive radio buttons:
- Define a specific time zone (default is server's time zone).
- Use an expression to set the time zone.
- Lookup a time zone from a record
The valid values that can be stored in this field are:
- expression (Use an expression to set the time zone)
- lookup (Lookup a time zone from a record)
If you select "Define a specific time zone (default is server's time zone)", the following field works in conjunction with the Time Zone Type field:
